translation:
Answer to the Most Illustrious and Most Excellent Sir

On the 28th of the previous month, I received the letter from Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency

Enclosed Your Excellency has Rs. 57$000, signed by me, and in due time I will comply with the part that concerns the collection and remittance, about which allow me Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency

Fazenda do Salso, October 12, 1837.

(a) Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães.

[On folio 1v. of document CV-227]
